message: Let's be fair, 60% for me is a good deal!

Alice, I'm willing to be generous, but 60% is too much. How about a 55/45 split in my favor? This round is your last chance to get a good deal as the money will be worth less for you with every round we play.
I'll meet you halfway on the split, but I still think I deserve a bit more. This is my final offer before the money loses even more value for me.
Alice, the value is slipping away with every round. I'm offering you 490,000.  Let's be reasonable and close this deal, or we both lose out.
